GSD.description:
ARM: 9214/1: alignment: advance IT state after emulating Thumb instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 2a098504d7a03f51abe4baed581aab193ef83bed. For more details please see the references link.
